explains: adj. 可疑的；不确定的，有问题的；可能不诚实(或不道德)的，别有用心的

sentences.en: He has been dogged by allegations of questionable business practices.
sentences.cn: 他一直被有可疑商业行为的传言困扰着。

sentences.en: Her motives for helping are questionable.
sentences.cn: 她帮忙的动机令人生疑。

sentences.en: His best friend died under questionable circumstances.
sentences.cn: 他最好的朋友在不明的情况下死了。
